enhanced_description: ASTC, established in 2013 and led by founders Dinesh Arya and Dushyant Arya with over 55 years of combined experience, is an executive search firm specializing in sourcing top passive talent for senior and pivotal roles. They partner with leading Indian, private, and multinational brands, offering services across India and the EMEA region. Employing a unique headhunting methodology focused on functional, behavioral, and cultural fit, ASTC emphasizes diligence and integrity to ensure optimal matches for both employers and candidates. Their process includes prospective candidate identification, competency-based interviews and evaluation, and presentation of shortlisted candidates. Key differentiators include fast track shortlisting within 5 weeks, hybrid payment terms (upfront and performance-based), and direct founders' support for the initial six months. ASTC aims to help clients hire top talent faster and more efficiently, while boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
